name: HA HA!
description:
Attention! This is a jam game made by a 14 year old so do not expect much!

HA HA! is a weird game that has bad jokes and really weird menu options. The game is about you speaking  with an AI until the end. It has two endings.

The game was made to fit the theme: Out Of Control

Control Gameplay by: LevitatingGaming

Font by: Sorry I downloaded it a while ago and I dont know. If it is your font, please contact me

I hope that it makes you smile...
